name: Last Teleport
description:
The game was refreshed! This is a demo version for reference, so the levels are simplified!
In the demo 3 levels of the 1st zone and 1 level of the 2nd zone.
In the game of current music (written by me), there are no other sounds!
Manage a simple A-D-E and a space, you can change if anyone is not comfortable.
Partially implemented control with a joystick.
The game is being developed, I need the Spine program, who can help with it, I will be glad to cooperate.
Here you can download the demo version. (54.2Mb)

Update for v.2(Fixed scripts and other compilation of the game.)

Update for v.2.1(Added particle effects in the menu for background.)
